description: List transactions with filtering and pagination. Returns summary statistics including totals and counts.

start_date.description: Filter transactions from this date (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD)

end_date.description: Filter transactions until this date (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD)

status.description: Filter by transaction status (succeeded, pending, failed, refunded, partially_refunded)

transaction_type.description: Filter by transaction type (payment, invoice, refund)

limit.description: Number of transactions to return. Default: 50, Max: 1000

offset.description: Number of transactions to skip for pagination. Default: 0
